00049        %> @brief Constructor is overload. 
00050        
00051        %> @param First:varargin{1} field of view (sensor element object) 
00052        %> @param First:varargin{2} phantom_name='rods_indx' 
00053        %> @param First:varargin{3} beta [degree] phantom rotate 
00054        %> @param First:varargin{4} permittivity value for all rods (circles)
00055        %> @param First:varargin{5} diameter of rod (circle) [milimeters]

00069        %>                    view
00070        %> @return instance of the Phantom_generator_2D class.
00071        % =====================================================================
00072        function ph_obj = Phantom_generator_2D(varargin)           
00073           if nargin == 0 ; % no input arguments
00074           elseif isa(varargin{1},'Phantom_generator_2D')
00075             ph_obj = varargin{1}; % copy constructor
00076             display 'copy constructor Phantom_generator_2D'
00077             return;          
00078           else
00079              switch(nargin)
00080                 case 6,   
00081                     fov=varargin{1};
00082                     ph_obj.phantom_name=varargin{2};
00083                     ph_obj.beta=varargin{3};
00084                     ph_obj.eps=varargin{4};
00085                     ph_obj.d_mm=varargin{5};   %- diameter of (node) circle        
00086                     ph_obj.D_mm=varargin{6};   %- node size 
00087                     
00088                     gs_mm=fov.discretization_grid_of_element.grid_size_mm;
00089 
00090                     
00091                     ph_obj.d=ph_obj.d_mm;
00092                     ph_obj.D=ph_obj.D_mm;
00093 
00094                     ph_obj.fov_diameter=fov.rmax_mm*2;
00095                     
00096                     if ph_obj.d>ph_obj.D
00097                         error('circle (d) is bigger than node (D)')
00098                     elseif ph_obj.d>ph_obj.fov_diameter
00099                         error('circle (d) is bigger than FOV diameter')
00100                     elseif ph_obj.D>ph_obj.fov_diameter
00101                         error('node (D) is bigger than FOV diameter')                        
00102                     end
00103                     
00104                     if strcmp(ph_obj.phantom_name,'ask_me')
00105                         
00106                     
00107                     ph_obj.discretization_grid_mm=fov.discretization_grid_of_element.matrix_size_mm;
00108                     ph_obj.discretization_grid_pixels_number=fov.discretization_grid_of_element.number_of_x_axis_pixel;                    
00109                     
00110                     ph_obj.discretization_grid=Discretization_grid_2D_square(fov.discretization_grid_of_element.matrix_size_mm, fov.discretization_grid_of_element.grid_size_mm);
00111               
00112                     
00113                     
00114                      ph_obj.list = ph_obj.phantom_rod_list(ph_obj.fov_diameter, ph_obj.d,ph_obj.D, ph_obj.beta, ph_obj.eps);                     
00115                     
00116                     
00117                      [ph_obj.ph_map]= ph_obj.phantom_rods(ph_obj.discretization_grid_mm,ph_obj.discretization_grid_pixels_number, ph_obj.list, fov.permittivity);
00118                      
00119                      image(ph_obj.ph_map,'cdatamapping','scaled');
00120                      set(gca,'PlotBoxAspectRatio',[1,1,1]);
00121                      
00122                      ph_obj.discretization_grid.matrix=ph_obj.ph_map;
00123                      ph_obj.discretization_grid.update_value_list();
00124                      
00125                      ph_obj.point_list=find(ph_obj.discretization_grid.matrix==ph_obj.eps);
00126                      
00127                     else
00128                         error('unknown mode');
00129                     end
00130                  case 7,
00131                      
00132                     fov=varargin{1};
00133                     ph_obj.phantom_name=varargin{2};
00134                     ph_obj.beta=varargin{3};
00135                     ph_obj.eps=varargin{4};
00136                     ph_obj.d_mm=varargin{5};   %- diameter of (node) circle        
00137                     ph_obj.D_mm=varargin{6};   %- node size 
00138                     ph_obj.indx=varargin{7};
00139                     
00140                     gs_mm=fov.discretization_grid_of_element.grid_size_mm;
00141 
00142                     
00143                     ph_obj.d=ph_obj.d_mm;
00144                     ph_obj.D=ph_obj.D_mm;
00145                     
00146                     
00147                     ph_obj.fov_diameter=fov.rmax_mm*2;
00148                     
00149                     if ph_obj.d>ph_obj.D
00150                         error('circle (d) is bigger than node (D)')
00151                     elseif ph_obj.d>ph_obj.fov_diameter
00152                         error('circle (d) is bigger than FOV diameter')
00153                     elseif ph_obj.D>ph_obj.fov_diameter
00154                         error('node (D) is bigger than FOV diameter')                        
00155                     end                                    
00156                     
00157                     if strcmp(ph_obj.phantom_name,'rods_indx')
00158                                             
00159 
00160                     ph_obj.discretization_grid_mm=fov.discretization_grid_of_element.matrix_size_mm;
00161                     ph_obj.discretization_grid_pixels_number=fov.discretization_grid_of_element.number_of_x_axis_pixel;                    
00162                     
00163                     ph_obj.discretization_grid=Discretization_grid_2D_square(fov.discretization_grid_of_element.matrix_size_mm, fov.discretization_grid_of_element.grid_size_mm);
00164                                                       
00165                      ph_obj.list = ph_obj.phantom_rod_list(ph_obj.fov_diameter, ph_obj.d,ph_obj.D, ph_obj.beta, ph_obj.eps);                     
00166                     
00167                      
00168                      [ph_obj.ph_map]= ph_obj.phantom_rods(ph_obj.discretization_grid_mm,ph_obj.discretization_grid_pixels_number, ph_obj.list, fov.permittivity);
00169                                                               
00170                      ph_obj.discretization_grid.matrix=ph_obj.ph_map;
00171                      ph_obj.discretization_grid.update_value_list();
00172                      ph_obj.point_list=find(ph_obj.discretization_grid.matrix==ph_obj.eps);
00173                     else
00174                         error('unknown mode');
00175                     end
00176                      
00177                   case 3,
00178                     fov=varargin{1};
00179                     ph_obj.phantom_name=varargin{2};                    
00180                     ph_obj.eps=varargin{3};
00181                     
00182                     if strcmp(ph_obj.phantom_name,'uniform')
00183                              
00184                         ph_obj.discretization_grid_mm=ph_obj.fov_diameter;
00185                         ph_obj.discretization_grid_pixels_number=fov.discretization_grid_of_element.number_of_x_axis_pixel;                    
00186                     
00187                         ph_obj.discretization_grid=Discretization_grid_2D_square(fov.discretization_grid_of_element.matrix_size_mm, fov.discretization_grid_of_element.grid_size_mm);
00188                                                 
00189 
00190 
00191                     vals=ones(1,numel(fov.point_list))*ph_obj.eps;
00192                     ph_obj.discretization_grid.value_list(fov.point_list)=vals;
00193                     ph_obj.point_list=fov.point_list;
00194                     else
00195                         error('unrecognized phantom name'); 
00196                     end
00197                         
00198                    
00199                  otherwise
00200                     display 'no input elements';
00201              end             
00202           end
00203        end       
00204 
00205    end

00209        % ======================================================================
00210        %> @brief % phantom_rod_list generates list of structures for ellipse objects
00211        %> structure: 
00212        %> center of ellipse, axes, ellipse rotation, permittivity value, polar
00213        %> coordinates of ellipse
00214        %>
00215        %> @param imsize diameter of field of view  
00216        %> @param beta object rotation (use to fit numeric to real object)[mm]
00217        %> @param d circle [mm]
00218        %> @param D node [mm]
00219        %> @param eps_value permittivity value for all rods
00220        %>

00222        % =====================================================================

00226        % =====================================================================
00227        %> @brief hexplot plots circles in hexagonal grid
00228        %>
00229        %> @param x0 x position of grid center, (x,0) - center of image
00230        %> @param y0 y position of grid center, (0,y) - center of image
00231        %> @param sizeX x side size of image [mm]
00232        %> @param sizeY y side size of image [mm]
00233        %> @param d diameter of (node) circle
00234        %> @param D node size
00235        %> @param ang1 grid rotation
00236        %> @param mode 'polar' plots all circles with polar coordinates
00237        %>             'cart'  plots all circles with carthesian coordinates
00238        %>             'index' plots all circles with index
00239        %>             'rods'  plots rods
00240        %>             'rods2' plots all circles and rods
00241        % =====================================================================
00242        function hexplot(phobj,x0,y0,sizeX,sizeY,d,D,ang1,mode,indx)

00291        % ======================================================================
00292        %> @brief phantom_rods calculates permittivity distribution for rod phantom
00293        %> creates numerical phantom with rods using list of positions and values
00294        %> the permittivity value is calculated only for FOV region
00295        %>
00296        %> @param discret_matrix_size_mm   side 'matrix size' in milimeters
00297        %> @param discret_matrix_size      side matrix size [number of grid elements]
00298        %> @param list                     vector of structures position (r,a), diameter and value for rods
00299        %> @param fov_permit               permittivity of field of view 
00300        %>
00301        %> @retval ph_map (matrix) permittivity
00302        % =====================================================================
00303        function[ph_map] = phantom_rods(phobj,discret_matrix_size_mm,discret_matrix_size, list, fov_permit)
00304        [ph_map] = phantom_rods(phobj,discret_matrix_size_mm,discret_matrix_size, list, fov_permit)

00306        % ======================================================================
00307        %> @brief  Set the elements of the Matrix Image which are in the interior of the
00308        %> ellipse E with the value 'color'. The ellipse E has center (y0, x0), the
00309        %> major axe = a, the minor axe = b, and teta is the angle macked by the
00310        %> major axe with the orizontal axe.
00311        %>
00312        %> @param y0 center of ellipse - y coordinate
00313        %> @param x0 center of ellipse - x coordinate
00314        %> @param a major axe
00315        %> @param b minor axe
00316        %> @param teta angle
00317        %> @param Image image
00318        %> @param color
00319        %>
00320        %> @retval ret elipse object
00321        % =====================================================================
00322        % function ret = ellipseMatrix(phobj,y0, x0, a, b, teta, Image, color)
00323        ret = ellipseMatrix(phobj,y0, x0, a, b, teta, Image, color)
